title: 墓园——MalyceGraves的艺作
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:pride-highlighter |inc-tg-alt= --]]]

[[module CSS]]

    .rmposttitle {
        width: auto;
        height: auto;
        padding: 0px 20px 0px 50px;
    }
[[/module]]


[[=]]
[[size 120%]]**[http://www.scp-wiki.net/malycegraves-author Malyce Graves]的艺作**[[/size]]
[[/=]]

这几年来我收集整理了很多艺作。之前我从来没有认真考虑过给SCP文章做些什么，直至我//真正//决定了要为我所创作的两个MTF画些标志。

随后，我创作了[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/theme:laruetheme 骇灵街主题版式]

而现在，我们齐聚一堂。
++ //骇灵街// 艺作
-----
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:sp-image caption=骇灵街|src=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-graveyard/sigil2.png|width=400]]

@@ @@
++ MTF标志
-----
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:sp-image caption=MTF Beta-2（“Bayou Boys”-河口男孩）|src=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-graveyard/beta2.png|width=400]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:sp-image caption=MTF Pi-6（“Clown Wranglers”-小丑牧人）|src=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-graveyard/pi6.png|width=400]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:sp-image caption=MTF Eta-5（“Jaeger Bombers”-猎人轰炸机）|src=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-graveyard/eta5.png|width=400]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:sp-image caption=MTF Xi-8 （“The Last to Fall”-最后倒下）|src=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-graveyard/xi-8.png|width=400]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:sp-image caption=MTF Gamma-44（“Meat Lockers”-肉狱）|src=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-graveyard/gamma-44.png|width=400]]

@@ @@

-----

-----
